en_US.myrecycleshop.helper1: Here is your recycling store interface. You can edit your own recycling store information, and also delegate and cancel recycled items

en_US.myrecycleshop.onreshop.helper1: This is the recycling Commission creation page
en_US.myrecycleshop.onreshop.helper2: Select one of your items to compare and establish a recycling Commission
en_US.myrecycleshop.onreshop.helper3: Or choose to create a non owned item in the item column to create a commission
en_US.myrecycleshop.onreshop.helper4: Pay attention to the composable button on the left, which will filter your composable items when enabled; When not enabled, all created items can be filtered

en_US.myshop.adjustshop.form.helper1: This page is used to modify the uploaded goods. Note that modifying the uploaded quantity can return some items to the backpack. When the backpack space is insufficient, it will be thrown out. Please confirm whether you have the permission to throw out the dropped objects.
en_US.myshop.error.invalidprice: The price you set is unreasonable (more than 9999999 or less than 0), please reset the reasonable price
en_US.myshop.error.itemchanged: Operation failed, item has been changed
en_US.myshop.error.shopinfoupdate: Operation failed, shopinfo has been changed
en_US.myshop.helper1: Here is your store interface. You can edit your own store information, publish discounts, edit, upload and replenish goods.
en_US.myshop.onshop.form.inputshopitemcanbesea: whether the product can be searched
en_US.myshop.onshop.form.inputshopitemnum: Select the quantity of items you want to upload
en_US.myshop.onshop.form.inputshopitemtag: Enter itemtag. Modification is not recommended
en_US.myshop.onshop.helper1: Select an item to move and upload
en_US.myshop.publishdiscount.form.inputdiscoun: Enter the item label (repeated entry will overwrite the existing discount)
en_US.myshop.publishdiscount.helper1: Set the discount of the store. Items with the item tag corresponding to the discount (set in commodity information editing) will be discounted. There are two ways to discount, one is to directly reduce the value (-100), and the other is the percentage (%5). The discount has a time limit and will expire after expiration.
en_US.myshop.replenishmentshop.helper1: Select an item you want to replenish
en_US.myshop.returnback: click to return to the previous menu
en_US.myshop.shopedit.form.inputshopicon: input the itemname to use as the icon

en_US.setfilter.inputPurchasedtimelimit: Set the sales volume limit of the selling store of the filter. Only when the sales volume of the store is greater than this value will it pass the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputfiltershopdescname: Set store description of the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputfiltershopitemdescname: Set item description of the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputfiltershopitemname: Set the product name of the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputfiltershopitemtagname: Set item label of the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputfiltershopownername: Store owner name of the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputrecycletimelimit: Set the recycling times limit of the recycling store of the filter. Only when the recycling times of the recycling store exceed this value will it pass the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputtotalcostlimit: Set the recycling cost limit of the recycling store of the filter. Only when the recycling cost of the recycling store exceeds this value will it pass the filter
en_US.setfilter.inputtotalsalelimit: Set the sales limit of the sales store of the filter. Only when the sales amount of the store is greater than this value will it pass the filter
en_US.shop.eventlogger.helper1: Click to view transaction records, and check and get offline money
en_US.shop.onshop.notfreecost: The items on the store have exceeded the free limit of {0}, and {1} will be charged for this time
en_US.shopview.readonlymode.helper1: The mode set for the PE. In read-only mode, clicking pe can not perform any operation, only touch reading can be used, and double clicking can operate unless in menu option area
en_US.shopview.readonlymode.helper2: To enter this mode, please move this item. Exit this mode, please "throw out" this auxiliary item
